synopsis.text: Thing is, the most beloved supervillain of all time, Heat, has a gambling debt that could cost him his life. But his biggest fan, Johnny Bolt, isn't about to let that happen. Johnny rallies a motley crew of supervillains for one last heist to save Heat and make them all filthy rich. The plan? Rob the world's most infamous super-powered crime boss in Spain. But as they say, the best-laid plans often go awry, and this one is no exception. Will Johnny and his crew pull off the heist of the century, or will they end up in the slammer with the rest of the supervillains who thought they could beat the system? Only one way to find out.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
